data.title: The Legend Of The Ugly King
data.meta_description: THE LEGEND OF THE UGLY KING is a documentary about the life and career of Kurdish filmmaker Yilmaz Guney.
data.text:
violence

Scenes of real violence include sight of a man hitting a man and slapping a child on a film set.

threat and horror

A scene from a film shows brief sexual threat when a silhouette of a man behind a curtain drags a woman to the floor.

language

There is infrequent strong language ('f**k') as well as a use of 'ass'.

In a clip from a film, a man grabs a snake and throws it to the floor; however there is no sight of a real snake being injured.
